website_summaries.verdict: This boomerang is brightly colored and can be easily bent into shape. It's a great choice for beginners.
pros: Instructions are embossed on underside of blades
Easy to bend back into shape

customer_reviews.title: It made from thick heavy duty plastic not foam or rubber this is a boomerang an adult can enjoy
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality made of thick hard plastic not foam or rubber and it's big you will need plenty of space to throw this one. If your into boomerangs this is the one for you I would definitely buy this boomerang again.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley N. Perry

customer_reviews.title: I like that the throwing guide is written on the back ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that the throwing guide is written on the back and this seems to work as well as can be expected, like, we could throw it and catch it without running too much. The problem seems to be the plastic it's made of. Parts of it flaked off after no more than an hour of usage and it wasn't because we were throwing it in an industrial waste yard.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J. Mcmillan

customer_reviews.title: A good first real boomerang for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a second boomerang for my grandkids. They are starting to be able to get it to almost come back. They have caught it a few times. A pretty good beginning boomerang. It came with a bit too much sharp flashing on it and my grandson got cut so I had to sand it a bit. No biggy.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Matteson

customer_reviews.title: One step past beginner boomerang material
customer_reviews.text: Better than most boomerangs this size. A little easier to throw than wooden boomerangs in its size class but still not quite beginner material. I recommend the tri-wings for beginners but this would be the next step up. Lost it in the trees but this one was fun while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Keys1281

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Fun
customer_reviews.text: Awsome. Take this to the park, and you will draw a crowd and have no shortage of friends. Easy to learn to throw and get to come back. Beats the heck out of a disc.
customer_reviews.author: Tim P

customer_reviews.title: 40 throws over a week and I'm still frustrated
customer_reviews.text: I have a pretty strong arm and can throw a 70 MPH baseball. I throw a frisbee and disc gofl disc farther than anyone I know. I read the booklet that came with the boomarang but I have yet to get it to return to me. My well protected park has no to very little wind. The best I seem to be able to do is a big U that lands 30 yards to my right. I tried tweaking the blade tip but it only got worse. I'm stumped and ready to give up. I'm going to check out the videos and see if they can enlighten me on what I'm doing wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Super fun electronics-free toy! Yahoo!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old cant get enough of this thing! He learned to throw it properly in a few hours and he can make it nearly return to himself most of the time. I’m impressed, actually! Ha!
customer_reviews.author: K. Kolk

customer_reviews.title: Not a kid friendly toy, will need parent around to help.
customer_reviews.text: My child and husband loved this until they lost it. It really does come back to you, or in your general area If you throw it correctly. It was easy for my husband to figure it out, i struggled doing it though. You have to throw it pretty hard and at a certain angle, so it will take him to get used to and learn. Other than that my family enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn Ningard

customer_reviews.title: Flies great, needs a big area
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to launch and fly, but it is fast and needs a big area, I'd suggest at least 200yd x 200yd free of trees. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo

customer_reviews.title: So much fun.
customer_reviews.text: It is a cheap way to have a lot of fun. It does take a little time to get the throwing technique down. If your not willing to put some time into learning how to use it or you are not willing to laugh at yourself...this is not for you. I am going to buy another one and take a friend out so they can try something different.
customer_reviews.author: Tom T.

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Boomerang!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a bit heavy. But I am a novist. I am currently throwing lighter boomerangs. I have been toying with boomerangs many years though, and I play disk golf. I have a growing collection of Colorado boomerangs! Overall it returned nicelyLike a hop skip and a jump away. Very nice boomerang!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W. Hartshorn

customer_reviews.title: Not a boom to my erang.  :(.  waaaah wawwwhhh.
customer_reviews.text: Can’t get the boom to erang. Not as easy as it shows in instructions.

customer_reviews.title: Very Entertaining
customer_reviews.text: My sons love this boomerang. They play for hours outside. Very entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much fun lost it in the park to a tree now its someone else's
customer_reviews.author: danielle

customer_reviews.title: Least favorite of my collection
customer_reviews.text: One of my least favorite boomerangs out of 7. Hardly ever returns.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: OMG it comes back!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. My dog loves to chase it too ( :-P good luck poochy, LOL )
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: now a favorite
customer_reviews.text: i have several 'rangs. this is now one of my favorites. it doesnt take a lot of power to get a good lofty return and only a wee bit of tuning to lower the return altitude. lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The boomerang is light and well made. We were grateful for the teaching instructions included with the boomerang. They were accurate and easy to follow, and we're now throwing and catching the boomerang. I would highly recommend this boomerang to beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Philips

customer_reviews.title: Great fun but one needs space!
customer_reviews.text: A Christmas gift- recipient - an athletic preteen , has loved it and it gets lots of use - just requires ample space!
customer_reviews.author: M.B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boomerang, with good return!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great boomerang!!! Returns nicely it was a little tricky to get the hang of it but really fun! Also very durable I’ve had it hit the pavement so many times I’ve only got a slight Chip in it. Note: beware of trees
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Poorly molded, but does work
customer_reviews.text: I've had to spend a great deal of time "tuning" the boomerang to fly right. It was poorly molded, and came with warped wings that had to be flattened and re-bent to have the proper dihedral. After that, it flies just fine. I don't remember the similarly-shaped Darnell boomerang that came with my old book needing that much work.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery C. May

customer_reviews.title: Good practice boomerang
customer_reviews.text: It is a good beginners boomerang. This one come with instructions on how to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Steep learning curve
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 10 yr old. Pretty steep learning curve. Even after multiple outings to learn, it still only comes back about 40% of the time. Wind plays a huge role, even slight.
customer_reviews.author: Lizard

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Flies great! Well worth it. Make sure you have a big open space because it covers a lot of ground. Many throws I had a chance to catch although making the actual catch of a boomerang is quite difficult right at the end of its flight, but fun!
customer_reviews.author: Evan Elken

customer_reviews.title: My 10 year old grandson just loves this. With ...
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old grandson just loves this. With minimal practice he has it returning to him and can on occasion catch the return. Word of caution, use only in very large open area. It will fly so much further than you ever imagine.
customer_reviews.author: POPS49

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: As Expected. Use more wrist then strength and it comes back every time.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Z

customer_reviews.title: can't loose it
customer_reviews.text: love it, returns well, nice bright color to find in tall grass. a boomerang that actually comes back AAAAAAA
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: use it on the beach
customer_reviews.text: Flys well and I use it on the beach. I may need another product that can cut the wind a little better like a frisbee. I do enjoy using this but the wind on the beach may be too much for this product. If you come to north Clearwater beach by Sand Pearl you will see me flying 2 of these.
customer_reviews.author: eagle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun once you get the hang of throwing it. It’s not hard to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.  Happy Kids.
customer_reviews.text: my 11year old son loves it. can get it to come back to him. he has a welt on his face to prove it :). Keep it away from cement as it will chip.
customer_reviews.author: thunderderusha

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly high quality
customer_reviews.text: Actually a lot higher quality than I thought- Used it in a parking lot where it hit the ground hard a bunch of times with only minor dents. It was lots of fun until I threw it on the roof :/ Recommend though!
customer_reviews.author: Torrey Tayenaka

customer_reviews.title: Not very fun..
customer_reviews.text: Meh.... Not very fun... Doesn't really come back. Im a former pro athlete...I know what I'm doing and its tough.. I think you need brisk Headwind to really get this thing to work..
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Awesome..
customer_reviews.text: Awesome... Took me about 15 experimental throws to get it to at least head back to me. Fun with kids... Can be frustrating for them though as it takes a bit of fine motor movement to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph V. Breton

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a working boomerang. He bought some decorative ones and was disappointed. This works pretty well. It is light so it will get stuck in trees and be VERY difficult to get out!
customer_reviews.author: MarkUJax

customer_reviews.title: good rang
customer_reviews.text: I am 70 years old and have been throwing these things for about 50 years. My throwing arm is not so good now but I can throw and catch this one 10 times in a row. A good one for learning.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Skeeter

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty fun to play with I mean it doesn't come ...
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty fun to play with I mean it doesn't come back exactly to your position but pretty close with enough practice
customer_reviews.author: Hector Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: It really worked!!!
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKS!!!!! We went to the park. Threw just like the instructions said and it came back....none of us had ever thrown one so we were all excited when it worked!!
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: It floats
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the stiffer carbon fiber boomerangs, but a lot cheaper and easier to find. And this one floats if you accidentaly throw it in the water. (my son lost his carbon boomerang while trowing it out over the ocean).
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fix It

customer_reviews.title: Don't throw full force into the street
customer_reviews.text: I chipped it when It landed on the street but that's my falt. Pretty fun but I haven't gotten the hand of it yet
customer_reviews.author: Lyston Knappenberger

customer_reviews.title: Nicely designed, foolproof boomerang for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the little hole on it; I would love to know the reason it exists as it kills my joy. Everyone should have a boomerang...
customer_reviews.author: tuNc

customer_reviews.title: It's very nice, but I would certainly recommend the High Quality ...
customer_reviews.text: It's very nice, but I would certainly recommend the High Quality Yanaki Sports Boomerang from Colorado over this. Got this for my 7 year old, and I've tried to use it too. It's ofcourse very sturdy, but a bit too light to make good flights.
customer_reviews.author: Soumitra Mukherji

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boomerang with comprehensive instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is my first boomerang and although I have had limited success so far, the instruction booklet is extremely helpful for a beginner. It has returned to me a few times, but usually not at the angle I expected. Well constructed, I must say.
customer_reviews.author: Ramy Agadi

customer_reviews.title: Buy a wood boomerang
customer_reviews.text: Does not work as expected but a quality wooden one
customer_reviews.author: devin lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought to replace one that was lost. The young boy that received it really liked the bright color. It was timely received and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a nephew for Xmas... it's still in the package so I can't comment on how it flies but it is much smaller than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: its ight
customer_reviews.text: first i was a little disappointed with the quality. i thought this was gonna break right away but it didnt. it did chip off a little bit after a while because i be throwing it over a parking lot. but this was my first ever boomerang and for a first boomerang its real good, for learning, trying new tricks before you try it on a real one and accidentially break a 30$ boomerang
customer_reviews.author: serge musatkin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Son couldn't get it to return but had fun. He lost it in a tree. so there is that.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Best boomerang out there
customer_reviews.text: It was fun takes some skill but once you get it it’s a blast! Make sure to follow the instructions on the back of the boomerang
customer_reviews.author: ty h.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It’s very fun just hard to learn how to make it come back to you but practice makes perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Antonia

customer_reviews.title: Not a toy, but darn fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: I got boomerangs for my son and I for Christmas. We went to a soccer field to practice and initially, we were pretty pathetic. After watching some confidence-building YouTube videos, we went back and what do you know? we were less pathetic. By the fourth time out though, we were actually pretty good. We have yet to catch them on the return, but we're really getting close. This is a fun boomerang, watch the videos, practice, and be patient. The boomerang is well built and its easy to see if you're holding it right or not. Most of the effectiveness, and the fun you have will rely on polishing your technique.
customer_reviews.author: Crosimoto

customer_reviews.title: Probably user error but I cannot get the darn thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Probably user error but I cannot get the darn thing to return to me consistently. I've had other 'rangs without this issue. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Croy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: fun for my grandson to play in the back yard with keep him interatine for hours
customer_reviews.author: Etta Berger

customer_reviews.title: Great for $12 plastic boomerang.
customer_reviews.text: Right-handed only, reasonable airfoil profiles, outer bottom edge tapers. It has a circular wide arc flight, you will need a fairly big area to throw it. It likes a little more lay-over than I expected. The black paint comes off easily, and I've never really abused it - the plastic seems to have a fairly low surface energy, almost like polyethylene so it isn't surprising the paint is having a hard time sticking to it, I've only ever hit grassy fields with it. I am surprised people report breaking theirs, the plastic seems too soft to be excessively brittle - so soft it doesn't really hold a dihedral set for long on a warm day which isn't great.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Yates

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun. Once you learn how to throw it it's a great thing to do in your spare time.
customer_reviews.author: Auston Jaehrling

customer_reviews.title: it's fun and works
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it's fun and works! people will come up to you and will want to use it. Bought it for my little brother he enjoyed it, even though he hard to please and a spoiled brat still love him though :D
customer_reviews.author: Jimbani

customer_reviews.title: Great boomerang
customer_reviews.text: VERY GOOD Boomerang. It's very easy to throw and catch. It's perfect for novices because the boomerang returns slow. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Pedro J. Torres Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Good low price boomerang
customer_reviews.text: Construction is durable and the boomerang offers a nice mid-long range and decent hover. Make sure you have plenty of room to throw this rang' because the trees will eat it up!
customer_reviews.author: christopher scott barrett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Grandson love this boomerang. And, because of it's color, it is harder to lose.
customer_reviews.author: B. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Product resembles the picture very well
customer_reviews.text: I was pleased with the size and product. My 14 year old grandson was very pleased with this boomerang. The material looks like a sturdy composition and will not break, like the wooden one he had previously.
customer_reviews.author: debra

customer_reviews.title: takes some practice but a lot of fun. Make sure you use it where there are ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well, takes some practice but a lot of fun. Make sure you use it where there are no trees or it will get stuck, for sure. Needs a very large open area.
customer_reviews.author: George Snedden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for beginners! Super strong so it won't break up when it hits something
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jaffe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: you need a soccer field size sapce to make this thing work, but it does!
customer_reviews.author: stefmac9

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just receivd all three but havent had a chance to throw them yet. they look great
customer_reviews.author: RONALD

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son in April for his birthday it's now July still no boomerang.
customer_reviews.author: the dude

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic boomarang that does okay
customer_reviews.text: Much better than most cheapies. Don't buy this if you are looking for a good boomerang that returns to you well. Expect it to get beat up pretty good when it hits trees etc. Overall it is about what I expected. You can buy these at most toy stores. I give it a 3/5 because the quality and performance of this boomerang did not blow me a way. Overall slightly above average is how I'd rate it. I have owned this product for almost 10 months.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan33

customer_reviews.title: If your curious, its worth it
customer_reviews.text: No better buy if you are looking for outdoor fun and adventure. If you were curious enough about boomerangs to look them up on amazon you will not be dissapointed while throwing this thing!!! When it says it has a long range its not joking... Football field or three clear area around you, and behind you while beginning. My first time i threw in a massive empty field by a lake and still went swimming, rock climbing, and tree climbing after my boomerang. I love it, and random stranger loved it too... Just be sure to say "you throw it, you get it."
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: my kids are love it. but kind of heavy. there is much more better boomerang outside.-like wood. it will be cool for kids.
customer_reviews.author: mure

customer_reviews.title: Requires a lot of space and you have to learn to throw it.
customer_reviews.text: You have to learn to throw it, which isn't all that easy. The big question, of course, is: Does it come back? Yes, but only if it's thrown correctly. Also note that learning to throw it requires a lot of open space and no wind at all. Otherwise the breeze will get hold of it and cause it to land in the middle of a cocktail party full of refined people on Saturday afternoon and cause the hostess to dump a tray of hors d'oeuvres into the pool.
customer_reviews.author: W.L. Emery

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Never did get it to fly consistantly. Climbed alot to get it out of trees though.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Parks

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It was awful it didn't work. All it does is fly away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Close.
customer_reviews.text: Does not come back as expected. Have tried every angle. Bought 2, one for 21 year old son, one for me. Either one of us could figure out how to not chase it at least 10 - 15 feet. Durable. Not a competition quality Boomerang. Expect to chase it. It is fun though. Needs plenty of room! Very bright and easy to see.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Recommended - 3.5stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these, one of them broke after a few days the other one is fine. Company stated that as long as it was received in tact they were not responsible for it breaking as it is an object that you throw around. Works pretty well and would recommend. Decent value for the price and shipped earlier than anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: SPROUT

customer_reviews.title: My son and I love using this boomerang
customer_reviews.text: My son and I love using this boomerang. We follow the instructions as closely as possible so we can learn how to use it. We bought this a year ago, and we both still suck at it. Go figure. It doesn't matter. It's our fault, not the boomerang's. It's plastic, but it is sturdy and flies long, long distances. I truly believe that one day it'll come back to us instead of us chasing it the length of the baseball field we toss it in.
customer_reviews.author: J. Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: fast shipping. I've never thrown one before and this seemed to be a great starting boomerang. Learned how to throw it after 30 minutes or so. Real durable
customer_reviews.author: osteor

customer_reviews.title: I PERSONALLY can not make it fly.
customer_reviews.text: I(this doesnt mean you cant) can not make it fly correctly. it seems to be functional, heres what i CAN tell you it is STURDY, it wont break if it hits a car or house. it is VISIBLE for when it flies astray and you need to find it. and t is fun EVEN if i can not make it fly correctly. BUY it for fun
customer_reviews.author: WPK

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: I gave my brother this boomerang. This sparked his creativity. He researched boomerangs. He built his own. He spent hours in the shop, honing and sanding and heating to make them fly exactly right. Then he went outside and threw it through my parents' bedroom window. Just so you're aware that the posted price may not be all you pay for it.
customer_reviews.author: Teikvah

customer_reviews.title: Boomerang
customer_reviews.text: Great Boomerang, It really did come back to me! After 3 throws, I had got it stuck in a blue spruce pine tree, and am still awaiting on it to fall to the ground :(
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Plastic boomerang
customer_reviews.text: The boomerang does work and good enough for a youths first boomerang ;) It was a little smaller and thinner than I envisioned but as I said,it works,and it seems to have the capacity for improvment with practice.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fun
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars because I never could get it to come back to me and it did get a few chips in it. Overall it was awesome and we played with it for hours. You do need a open area to use this. I say was fun because my brother in-law tried to shoot it out of a tree and now its broke. So its not bullet proof. Other then that it is a good buy. I am getting another one for my brother.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Griffy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son loved it but he lost it in a week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice fly
customer_reviews.text: It seems heavy due to its size but after you throw it it flies perfectly. There are instructions printed on the plain side which helps you to find the correct spot to launch it.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: fun toy with practice!!!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you read the instructions! My daughter and I get it out almost everyday and try to out boomerang each other. Who can get it closest to right back.
customer_reviews.author: Biryl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Perfect for our son and much fun for the whole family!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: go to big field.
customer_reviews.text: My kid loved it for the three throws that he owned it. It now sits on top of a building forever more.
customer_reviews.author: David Wirth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!!
customer_reviews.text: Both of my sons have used this since it came in the mail. It was a birthday gift for our youngest son who just turned 8. It works! It is awesome and comes back once thrown properly. The oldest has the hang of it already and the youngest is getting there. Go to a large field is the best recommendation because you need SPACE but they do love it and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JennLynnMen

customer_reviews.title: Fun but fragile
customer_reviews.text: Fun, but the plastic is very hard and not resilient. In the grass it'd be fine I'm sure, but in Nyc we play on asphalts. This didn't hold up for more than a few dozen tosses without getting severely chipped to the point that it probably effected the aerodynamics
customer_reviews.author: matthew a tarr

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Boomerangs
customer_reviews.text: Great boomerang! Returns VERY well. Fairly heavy in the boomerang spectrum, so works well in mild wind. Weight also increases throwing distance, so be sure to have a large open area to use it in! I've owned about two dozen boomerangs, and this is in my top 3. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Brook B.

customer_reviews.title: Seems bent on arrival I guess that is on purpose ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems bent on arrival I guess that is on purpose so it would come back? Didn't work well. I am sure the learning curve is most of problem but u would think it would come back slightly but it didn't.
customer_reviews.author: L bel

customer_reviews.title: Great boomerang
customer_reviews.text: This boomerang isn't really for young kids because of its size and it's hard plastic structure. However it flies great and I was able to get it to return to me within a couple of tries. You need a lot of space for it though because the aerodynamics allow it to travel pretty far.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin R. Supak

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: bright and light! the boomerang works after you get the hang of it. It is very thin and hard to see when it is returning. still very fun!
customer_reviews.author: fdgfhg

customer_reviews.title: Need to wait until warmer weather
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for my grandsons for Christmas. They really haven't had a chance to try them out until the weather breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Fun for my 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: Good boomerang, we just can't figure out how to make it come back( we read the instructions and watched videos on YouTube).
customer_reviews.author: kisha

customer_reviews.title: This was purchased as a gift and has not actually ...
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a gift and has not actually been used yet. However, I am crossing my fingers that it flies as intended. It's a rather cheap piece of molded plastic and a little pricey for such. Just though I'd get that out there for anyone looking for a gift. This will not impress you at first look. Hopefully it wows once they start playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Buy a quality boomerang instead
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a boomerang. Good luck getting it to act like a boomerang.
customer_reviews.author: BDS

customer_reviews.title: Please be careful
customer_reviews.text: Just got my Boomerang today! And i also got one for my brother one. Went down to the park near my house and threw it around. Everything went great until I threw mine hard and too close to the ground, it curved and smashed into my brothers head. He's at the hospital now he needs stiches. Take my advice, please be careful! Before this everything went great, I was still trying to get the hang of it and will try next week once his head heals. Would be Five stars but I injured my brother. Again my fault not the boomerangs
customer_reviews.author: RougeSatus

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It arrived fast and my son loves playing with this boomerang.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good so far how this xmas they'll enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric askue

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: tough to get it to work correctly especially for a young kid
customer_reviews.author: brian fromond

customer_reviews.title: Broken within 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Gave the boomerang to our son for Christmas and within 30 minutes it broke when it hit the grass. I would not recommend this item!
customer_reviews.author: Thumbs Up

customer_reviews.title: Not for lefties
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew it was a right handed boomerang. My son is a leftie. Also, it is very difficult to fly for right handed people.
customer_reviews.author: nancypas

product_meta.title: Polypropylene Pro Sports Boomerang - for Ages Above 10 Years Old. Real Sport Boomerangs Designed by a Former World Champion!
product_meta.description: The Pro-Sport is a classic V-Omega boomerang with a range of 30+ meters. It is made from a very durable polypropylene material and is priced for volume sale. This boomerang is designed by a former world champion. It is a real, working boomerang. It has great wind resistance and works well when it's calm too! Use it as a sports model for casual throwing or modify it for Boomerang competitions. Instructions are embossed on the underside of the blades. An excellent first time, general purpose boomerang at a GREAT value. Bright ORANGE color for maximum visibility in the air! ** Right-Handed Only **
feature_bullets: Includes our "How to Throw Boomerangs" Instructions
Age = 10 - 70 years old. For RIGHT HANDED THROWERS ONLY!
Also Includes access to our how to throw videos.
From the worldwide leader - Colorado Boomerangs!
